# TimeAsyncHelper.DelayActionAsync method

Make a wait asynchronously and then execute the specified action.

```csharp
public static Task DelayActionAsync(int delay, Action action)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| delay | Wait time |
| action | Action to execute |

## Return Value

A new Task when the action ends.
